duties_responsibilities.duty: Conduct research in the field of immunology and immunometabolism, focusing on the metabolic regulation of the immune system and its implications in cancer and other diseases.
Integrate immunological and genetic approaches with cutting-edge systems immunology and functional genomics tools to investigate metabolic programs, signaling pathways, and regulatory networks.

Apply interdisciplinary strategies to gain new insights into biological concepts and disease targets, utilizing in vivo CRISPR screening, single-cell transcriptomics, proteomics, metabolomics, and network reconstruction.

education_certification.credential: Ph.D. in Immunology or Cell Biology with a minimum of one-first author publication in a peer-reviewed journal
